name: Alexa Z.
title: Delicious!
text: Oh. My. Delicious! First time customer and I am blown away! Definitely stopping here whenever I’m in Monroeville. My husband got a vanilla caramel voltage over ice and I had a red velvet chiller. 100% amazing products and service!

name: John D.
title: Amazing Coffee!
text: Great coffee place. It's a little hidden but if you're in the Pharr area by Main Event, take a look behind the main shopping front and you'll find this little hidden gem of a place.

name: Sophia L.
title: Loved it!
text: Oscar made me the best latte! Love this place when coming in to shop. Highly recommended

name: Michael B.
title: Fantastic Atmosphere
text: Really enjoyed the vibe here. Perfect spot to relax and get some work done with great coffee.

name: Emily R.
title: Best Latte Ever
text: I’ve tried lattes everywhere, but this place makes the best one hands down!

name: Daniel K.
title: Cozy & Warm
text: Love the interior design and the friendly staff. Always feel welcomed.

name: Olivia M.
title: Highly Recommended
text: Tried their caramel macchiato and it was heavenly. Will come back for sure!

name: Liam S.
title: Perfect for Study
text: Great place to sit with my laptop and focus. Calm, clean and great coffee.

name: Isabella W.
title: Sweet Treats
text: Not only coffee, but their desserts are to die for! Red velvet cake is my favorite.

name: James P.
title: Great Service
text: Staff is super polite and helpful. They make you feel at home instantly.

name: Mia T.
title: Super Friendly
text: Baristas are so nice and always greet you with a smile. Love this place!

name: Ethan R.
title: Coffee Lover’s Dream
text: The coffee quality is unmatched. Rich flavor, perfect temperature, every time.

name: Charlotte K.
title: Great Experience
text: My go-to spot for meeting friends. Chill vibes and tasty drinks.

name: Noah H.
title: Awesome Place
text: Always clean, fast service, and the frappes are the best!

name: Amelia C.
title: Lovely Café
text: The decoration is beautiful and the coffee aroma is incredible.

name: Benjamin F.
title: Best in Town
text: Forget the big chains, this place is where true coffee is made!

name: Harper V.
title: Feels Like Home
text: Every time I come here, I feel relaxed and happy. 10/10 service.

name: Elijah N.
title: Perfect Spot
text: I love sitting by the window with my cappuccino. Peaceful and nice.

name: Ava B.
title: Incredible Drinks
text: The iced mocha is my favorite. Refreshing and rich in flavor.

name: William G.
title: Top Choice
text: Whenever I’m around, this is my number one coffee place. Highly recommend!
